SELECT b.BILL_ID as billId, b.BILLFREQ as billFreq, b.INSURE_ID as insureId, b.INSURE_ID as cherNum, b.REPNUM as repnum, b.TTMPRCNO as ttmpRcno, b.FEETYP as feeTyp, b.HISSDTE as hissDte, b.DSOURCE as dSource, b.CHANNEL as channel, t.TRANS_DATE as transDate, t.TRANS_DATE as transDate, t.TRANS_ID as transId, to_char(to_date(b.BILL_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as billDate, b.BILL_CODE as billCode, b.BILL_NO as billNo, b.CUSTOMER_NAME as customerName, b.CUSTOMER_TAXNO as customerTaxno, b.AMT_SUM as amtSum, b.TAX_AMT_SUM as taxAmtSum, b.SUM_AMT as sumAmt, b.FAPIAO_TYPE as fapiaoType, b.DATASTATUS as dataStatus, b.IS_HANDIWORK as isHandiwork, b.ISSUE_TYPE as issueType, u.SELECTED_VALUE as cancelTime, b.DRAWER as drawer, u1.user_cname as drawerName, b.REVIEWER as reviewer, u2.user_cname as reviewerName FROM VMS_BILL_INFO b left join u_base_user u1 on u1.user_cname = b.drawer left join u_base_user u2 on u2.user_cname = b.reviewer left join ( select bill_id, max(TRANS_ID) as TRANS_ID from VMS_TRANS_BILL b group by b.bill_id ) tb on tb.BILL_ID = b.BILL_ID left join VMS_TRANS_INFO t on t.TRANS_ID = tb.TRANS_ID left join U_BASE_VMSS_PARAM u on u.ITEM_KEY = 'OBSOLTETTIME' where b.DATASTATUS in #dataStatus[]# and (EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) - EXTRACT(YEAR FROM TO_DATE(b.BILL_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')))=0 and (EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SYSDATE) - EXTRACT(MONTH FROM TO_DATE(b.BILL_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')))=0
b.INSURE_ID like '%$billCancelInfo.cherNum$%' or b.REPNUM like '%$billCancelInfo.cherNum$%'
b.TTMPRCNO like '%$billCancelInfo.ttmpRcno$%'
b.FEETYP = #billCancelInfo.feeTyp#
b.BILLFREQ = #billCancelInfo.billFreq#
to_date(b.BILL_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') >= to_date(#billCancelInfo.billBeginDate#,'yyyy-mm-dd')
to_date(b.BILL_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') <= to_date(#billCancelInfo.billEndDate#,'yyyy-mm-dd')
to_date(b.HISSDTE,'yyyy-mm-dd') >= to_date(#billCancelInfo.hissBeginDte#,'yyyy-mm-dd')
to_date(b.HISSDTE,'yyyy-mm-dd') <= to_date(#billCancelInfo.hissEndDte#,'yyyy-mm-dd')
b.DSOURCE = #billCancelInfo.dSource#
b.CHANNEL = #billCancelInfo.channel#
order by b.BILL_DATE desc
sqlMap.select: SELECT b.BILL_ID as billId, b.BILL_DATE as billDate, b.BILL_CODE as billCode, b.BILL_NO as billNo, b.CUSTOMER_NAME as customerName, b.CUSTOMER_TAXNO as customerTaxno, b.AMT_SUM as amtSum, b.TAX_AMT_SUM as taxAmtSum, b.SUM_AMT as sumAmt, b.FAPIAO_TYPE as fapiaoType, b.DATASTATUS as dataStatus, b.CANCEL_INITIATOR as cancelInitiator, b.CANCEL_AUDITOR as cancelAuditor, b.OPERATESTATUS as operateStatus, b.DRAWER as drawer, u1.user_cname as drawerName, b.REVIEWER as reviewer, u2.user_cname as reviewerName FROM VMS_BILL_INFO b left join u_base_user u1 on u1.user_id = b.drawer left join u_base_user u2 on u2.user_id = b.reviewer where b.BILL_ID = #billCancelInfo.billId#
sqlMap.update:
update VMS_BILL_INFO set
CANCEL_INITIATOR = #cancelInitiator#,
OPERATESTATUS = DATASTATUS, DATASTATUS = #dataStatus# where BILL_ID = #billId#

update VMS_BILL_INFO set
CANCEL_INITIATOR = #cancelInitiator#,
DATASTATUS = OPERATESTATUS ,
DATASTATUS = #dataStatus# ,
CANCEL_REASON = #cancelReason# where BILL_ID = #billId#
update VMS_BILL_INFO set DATASTATUS = #dataStatus#, CANCEL_REASON = #cancelReason# where BILL_ID = #billId#
update VMS_BILL_INFO set DATASTATUS = #dataStatus#, REVIEWER = #reviewer# where BILL_ID = #billId#
sqlMap.select: select count(*) from VMS_BILL_INFO b left join u_base_user u1 on u1.user_id = b.drawer left join u_base_user u2 on u2.user_id = b.reviewer left join VMS_TRANS_BILL tb on tb.BILL_ID = b.BILL_ID left join VMS_TRANS_INFO t on t.TRANS_ID = tb.TRANS_ID where b.DATASTATUS = #dataStatus# and (b.CANCEL_INITIATOR <> #cancelAuditor#) and ((EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) - EXTRACT(YEAR FROM TO_DATE(b.BILL_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')))=0 and (EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SYSDATE) - EXTRACT(MONTH FROM TO_DATE(b.BILL_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')))=0)

select count(*) from VMS_BILL_INFO b left join u_base_user u1 on u1.user_id = b.drawer left join u_base_user u2 on u2.user_id = b.reviewer left join VMS_TRANS_BILL tb on tb.BILL_ID = b.BILL_ID left join VMS_TRANS_INFO t on t.TRANS_ID = tb.TRANS_ID left join U_BASE_VMSS_PARAM u on u.SELECTED_VALUE='5' where b.DATASTATUS in (14,15) and ((EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) - EXTRACT(YEAR FROM TO_DATE(b.BILL_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')))=0 and (EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SYSDATE) - EXTRACT(MONTH FROM TO_DATE(b.BILL_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')))=0)

select t.TRANS_ID as transId, t.BALANCE as balance, t.DATASTATUS as dataStatus, t.TRANS_TYPE as transType, t.AMT_CNY as amt, t.TAX_AMT_CNY as taxAmt, t.INCOME_CNY as income, tb.INCOME_CNY as tbincomeCny from VMS_TRANS_INFO t inner join vms_trans_bill tb on tb.trans_id = t.trans_id and tb.bill_id = #transInfo.billId#
sqlMap.update:
update VMS_TRANS_INFO set BALANCE = #balance#, DATASTATUS = #dataStatus# where TRANS_ID = #transId#
BILL_ITEM_ID = #billItemId#

order by b.BILL_DATE desc

SELECT b.BILL_ID as billId, t.TRANS_DATE as transDate, t.TRANS_ID as transId, t.TAX_RATE as taxRate, b.BILL_DATE as billDate, b.BILL_CODE as billCode, b.BILL_NO as billNo, b.CUSTOMER_NAME as customerName, b.CUSTOMER_TAXNO as customerTaxno, b.AMT_SUM as amtSum, b.TAX_AMT_SUM as taxAmtSum, b.SUM_AMT as sumAmt, b.FAPIAO_TYPE as fapiaoType, b.DATASTATUS as dataStatus, b.APPLY_DATE as applyDate, b.IS_HANDIWORK as isHandiwork, b.ISSUE_TYPE as issueType, b.DRAWER as drawer, b.tax_disk_no as taxDiskNo, b.MACHINE_NO as machineNo, u1.user_cname as drawerName, b.REVIEWER as reviewer, u2.user_cname as reviewerName FROM VMS_BILL_INFO b left join u_base_user u1 on u1.user_id = b.drawer left join u_base_user u2 on u2.user_id = b.reviewer left join ( select bill_id, max(TRANS_ID) as TRANS_ID from VMS_TRANS_BILL tb group by tb.bill_id) tb on tb.BILL_ID= b.BILL_ID left join VMS_TRANS_INFO t on t.TRANS_ID = tb.TRANS_ID where b.DATASTATUS IN (#dataStatus#)
